data.title: Charles Strouse
data.text:
Born: 7-Jun-1928

Birthplace: New York City

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Composer

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Bye Bye Birdie

Collaborator with Lee Adams.

Father: Ira Strouse (tobacco executive)

Mother: Ethel Newman

Wife: Barbara Siman (m. 23-Sep-1962, three sons, one daughter)

Son: Benjamin

Son: Nicholas

Daughter: Victoria

Son: William Lee

High School: Townsend Harris High School, Queens, NY (transferred)

High School: DeWitt Clinton High School, Bronx, NY (1944)

University: Eastman School of Music

University: BMus, University of Rochester (1947)

Tony 1961 for Bye Bye Birdie (best musical)

Tony 1970 for Applause (best musical)

Tony 1977 for Annie (original score)

Emmy 1996 for Bye Bye Birdie (music and lyrics)

Songwriters Hall of Fame 1985

Author of books:

Put on a Happy Face: A Broadway Memoir (2008)

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
